channel.title: ExoPK | Custom Items | Custom Home | Active Staff | Vps Hosted | Staff Needed |
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/263twma.png[/img]
[i][b]ExoPK is a NEW fast growing RSPS looking for staff, with at least 25+ players on a day, and staff on daily. Weekly updated server, with a friendly community.[/b][/i]
- Donator/Super Donator island - Custom Bosses - Corp Beast - Tormented demons - At least 20 players on a day that are willing to help YOU. - Server has been up for 3 months - Players from all around the world! - Custom Maps! - Custom PK Areas!- Custom Items such as Wings,Cape,Phat,H'ween,Whips, Shield & Swords - Working curses, - Overloads - Chaotics - Korasi's sword - Handcannon + working special attack, - Torva, Primal + Primal wepeans - Elemental infinity (Air, Fire, Earth, Water) - Colored Whips & Dark Bow - Friendly and Active Owner! - Friendly Staff
DONOR BENEFITS - Regular Donors get unlimited yell - Super Donors get unlimited yell and ::banker - Super Donors & Regular Donors get to go to Donator Island - 2 Free Rares 1 Regular item from the donor chest - Donator Only Items / Shop - Cool symbol in-game!
To join our forums: www.exopk.enjin.com Main Site: www.Exopk.com
We're Currently Working on Some Fixes and Bugs because we've started a fresh new client and it's getting started this weekend. :)
Skype name: Trilogy_jwz [ ME ] Skype name: jrummusic [ Main Owner ]

item.title: ExoPK | Custom Items | Custom Home | Active Staff | Vps Hosted | Staff Needed |
item.dc:creator: @exo-pk exo-pk
item.description:
@exo-pk wrote:

[quote=“nexxus, post:1, topic:546680”]

ExoPK is a NEW fast growing RSPS looking for staff, with at least 25+ players on a day, and staff on daily. Weekly updated server, with a friendly community.

  • Donator/Super Donator island
  • Custom Bosses
  • Corp Beast
  • Tormented demons
  • At least 20 players on a day that are willing to help YOU.
  • Server has been up for 3 months
  • Players from all around the world!
  • Custom Maps!
  • Custom PK Areas!- Custom Items such as Wings,Cape,Phat,H’ween,Whips, Shield & Swords
  • Working curses,
  • Overloads
  • Chaotics
  • Korasi’s sword
  • Handcannon + working special attack,
  • Torva, Primal + Primal wepeans
  • Elemental infinity (Air, Fire, Earth, Water)
  • Colored Whips & Dark Bow
  • Friendly and Active Owner!
  • Friendly Staff

DONOR BENEFITS

  • Regular Donors get unlimited yell
  • Super Donors get unlimited yell and ::banker
  • Super Donors & Regular Donors get to go to Donator Island
  • 2 Free Rares 1 Regular item from the donor chest
  • Donator Only Items / Shop
  • Cool symbol in-game!

To join our forums: www.exopk.enjin.com
Main Site: www.Exopk.com
Down Load: http://www.exopk.com/uploads/1/6/3/3/16333902/exo-pkv1.jar
Pictures: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/vjnk7izrq5h8a13/AAAUG45HCpMrhSI2CH8Uxikja?dl=0

We’re Currently Working on Some Fixes and Bugs because we’ve started a fresh new client and it’s getting started this weekend.

Skype name: Trilogy_jwz [ ME ]
Skype name: jrummusic [ Main Owner ][/quote]
